name: Cooked Grapes With Cream
keywords: dessert, side dish, red grapes, sour cream, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds seedless Red Flame grapes, stems removed (approximately 4 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Place grapes, vinegar and water in a stainless-steel saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook gently for about 5 minutes. The grapes will lose their red color and begin to crack open.

Meanwhile, in a bowl combine the lemon rind, lemon juice, honey and mint leaves. When grapes are cooked, add them to lemon-honey mixture and stir well. When cool, add the Cognac. Serve in wine glasses, garnished with a spoonful of sour cream.
